job_title: Anonymous Employee in Vancouver, BC
pros: nothing positive came out of my experience

job_title: Purchasing in New Westminster, BC
pros: A much needed service is provided, the work can be rewarding.
cons: Horrible leadership, Nepotism has run rampant in the head office and there are multiple people in positions of power squandering much-needed resources. Low pay, no raises and high levels of burn-out should also be expected.

job_title: Development Associate in New Westminster, BC
pros: - great communication from top level management - writing and research intensive job - the work is for a good cause - no set lunch time (could be a potential con, as people tend to work through lunch often)
cons: - understaffed department - slow equipment - underpaid, overworked employees - depending on the assignment, you might have to work through lunch
